pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Jered Weaver; Dustin Pedroia is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .864 OPS against them this season and .770 against everything else.
Jered Weaver is trying to tie up Dustin Pedroia with fastballs inside; Pedroia is hitting .230 on pitches in that location compared to .279 overall.
